body:
https://snyk.io/test/github/powershell/powershell/v6.0.0 will give you a link on what to do

This will give a history of vulns if done correctly.

comments.body: snyk doesn't currently support DotNet projects via manifest but only via CLI

title: Add manifest to support Snyk tag and tag releases
